name: Joshbob Moves In
description:
Growing up in the bogs isn't easy. But with a loving Goblin family and a "can do" attitude, Joshbob is ready to trade in the swamp for the comfort and class of the big city.

How will Joshbob adapt to his new life and his new things?

How to play:

  • Left click to interact.
  • Left click on inventory to select item. Left click item on something to use it.

Game made in about 35 hours for $106 adventure game challenge. Theme was stranger in a strange land.

Tools and Assets used:

  • Unity
  • Adventure Creator
  • Audacity
